text: Jiss kay pass kitab ka ilm tha woh bol utha kay aap palak jhapkayen uss say bhi pehlay mein ussay aap kay pass phoncha sakta hun. Jab aap ney ussay apnay pass mojood paya to farmaney lagay yehi meray rab ka fazal hai takay woh mujhay aazmaye kay mein shukar guzari kerta hun aur jo na shukri keray to mera perwerdigar (bay perwa aur buzurg) ghani aur kareem hai
